page.title: 12CHURCH IN SHEFFIELD
page.content: I go to{Walkley Baptist Church}which is in Crookes, Sheffield. The service starts at 10.30am on Sunday and finishes about midday. I enjoy singing tke hymns and choruses. There is a group for young children aged 5 to 8 years old, they go out during the sermon. {Billy Graham,}an American Christian who is trying to bring people to know God, has been in Sheffield recently. A group from our church went to hear him speak, I went 3 times. He was speaking at one of the local football grounds and people who wanted to follow Jesus could go on to the pitch and say so. I enjoyed the meetings, they were on 22nd to 29th June 1985. I have gone to church all my life, I go because my whole family are Christians.
